acolyte

Interface StatementHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompositeHandler

    public interface StatementHandler
    Statement handler: allow to process statement by 'hand' and return.
    Author:
    Cedric Chantepie

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  StatementHandler.Parameter
      Meaningful, user-friendly and immutable type alias for ugly Pair

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ResultSet getGeneratedKeys()
      Returns keys generated by last execution.
      boolean isQuery(String sql)
      If statement is neither a PreparedStatement nor a CallbableStatement, determines whether given |sql| is a query.

      When given |sql| query is executed against Acolyte connection ...
      int whenSQLUpdate(String sql, List<StatementHandler.Parameter> parameters)
      When given |sql| update is executed against Acolyte connection ...

    • Method Detail

      • whenSQLQuery

        Result whenSQLQuery(String sql,
                  List<StatementHandler.Parameter> parameters)
                    throws SQLException
        When given |sql| query is executed against Acolyte connection ...
        Parameters:
        sql - SQL query (with '?' for prepared/callable statement)
        parameters - Parameters (or empty map if none)
        Returns:
        Query result set
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • whenSQLUpdate

        int whenSQLUpdate(String sql,
                List<StatementHandler.Parameter> parameters)
                  throws SQLException
        When given |sql| update is executed against Acolyte connection ...
        Parameters:
        sql - SQL query (with '?' for prepared/callable statement)
        parameters - Parameters (or empty map if none)
        Returns:
        Row count
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • isQuery

        boolean isQuery(String sql)
        If statement is neither a PreparedStatement nor a CallbableStatement, determines whether given |sql| is a query. If returns true, whenSQLQuery will be called.

      • getGeneratedKeys

        ResultSet getGeneratedKeys()
        Returns keys generated by last execution. FOR FUTURE USE.
